name: UpsertResult

methods.name: getErrors
methods.description: If an error occurred, returns an array of one or more database error objects providing the error code and description. If no error occurred, returns an empty set.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the ID of the sObject you were trying to update or insert.

methods.name: isCreated
methods.description: A Boolean value that is set to true if the record was created, false if the record was updated.

methods.name: isSuccess
methods.description: Returns a Boolean value that is set to true if the DML operation was successful for this object, false otherwise.

description: The result of an upsert DML operation returned by the Database.upsert method.
